S

SantaClaus - Class in cds.java.project.actors
Implementation of Santa Claus under the form of a thread; Santa's job is to get the gifts from the pipe that he shares with all his reindeer; then he has to put it in his bag of presents
SantaClaus(int, ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift>) - Constructor for class cds.java.project.actors.SantaClaus
Constructor for the class that sets the number of kids and the shared pipe between Santa Claus and his reindeer; the running flag is set by default to true
santaClaus - Variable in class cds.java.project.workshop.NorthPoleWorkshop
Instance of the Santa Claus object
santaClausBagOfGifts - Variable in class cds.java.project.actors.SantaClaus
List that simulates Santa's Christmas bag
serviceThreadSemaphore - Variable in class cds.java.project.actors.Reindeer
Binary semaphore shared by the serviceThread that asks elves from all factories about their position and by all reindeer; it ensures that reindeer do not take gifts from the factories when these are giving information about their elves to the service thread (the elf state getter thread)
serviceThreadSemaphore - Variable in class cds.java.project.servicethreads.ElfStateGetter
Service thread semaphore that coordinates the relation between the elf state getter and the reindeer
serviceThreadSemaphore - Variable in class cds.java.project.workshop.NorthPoleWorkshop
Semaphore instance used in order to synchronize the elfStateGetter thread and the reindeer because they are not allowed to get gifts when the service thread performs a query

Setter method for elf assigned factory

SimpleBooleanGrid - Class in cds.java.project.grid
Implementation of a Simple boolean grid structure under the form of a class; This is a simple object structure that is needed in the micro world of the program in order to simulate a North Pole Workshop; it wraps a boolean matrix that must play the role of the place in which elves reside and do their work by moving and creating gifts
SimpleBooleanGrid(int) - Constructor for class cds.java.project.grid.SimpleBooleanGrid
Constructor gets as a parameter the order of the matrix; this is the one that will be used in the problem, as all matrices are square ones with of a given order; it sets the length and height to be both equal to the order of the matrix and a new background matrix structure is created and filled with false (in the case of the problem, no elves in in at the moment)
SimpleBooleanGrid(int, int) - Constructor for class cds.java.project.grid.SimpleBooleanGrid
Constructor gets as a parameter the length and height dimensions of the matrix; it sets the length and height accordingly and creates the matrix structure it will be filled with false
SimpleGrid<T> - Class in cds.java.project.grid
Implementation of a SimpleGrid template structure under the form of a class; This was the basic form for the grid that I intended to use, but I decided to stick with a simpler implementation (left this here as it is a way better way of working with a grid and, I might use it in a future rework); it wraps a template matrix that must play the role of the place in which elves reside and do their work by moving and creating gifts
SimpleGrid(int) - Constructor for class cds.java.project.grid.SimpleGrid
Constructor gets as a parameter the order of the matrix; this is the one that will be used in the problem, as all matrices are square ones with of a given order; it sets the length and height to be both equal to the order of the matrix and a new background matrix structure is created
SimpleGrid(int, int) - Constructor for class cds.java.project.grid.SimpleGrid
Constructor gets as a parameter the length and height dimensions of the matrix; it sets the length and height accordingly and creates the matrix structure
sleepWhenSurrounded() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.ElfWorker
Method that ensures that, if surrounded, an elf will wait for some time (random between 10 and 50 milliseconds) and then try again to move and create gifts
